alert.note: Alert for Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 21 at 2:15PM MDT until July 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS BELOW 6000 FT ON FRIDAY... .An area of low pressure will move by to the north tonight into Friday. This will generate gusty west to northwest winds Friday afternoon and evening across much of central and southern Idaho. Winds will combine with low afternoon humidity and critically dry fuels below 6000 ft to create critical fire weather conditions. Winds will decrease Friday evening with lighter winds on Saturday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR SOUTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST/WESTERN SAWTOOTH NATIONAL FOREST BELOW 6000 FT...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 421 BELOW 6000 FT...424 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Friday. * WINDS...Gusts 25 to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...9 to 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
